subject: Re: Still: "AIGLX: Screen 0 not dri capable"
body:
On Sat, 26 May 2007, Georg Heinrich wrote:

> I get this error message after startup at the login prompt.
thats not clearly an error.

please post the output from:

uname -a
lspci

and your Xorg.0.log

> Any hint is welcome.
> Thanks in advance,
-- 
Florian Reitmeir
